text: Staying informed on the complexities of the Ukraine conflict 💡 China's Xi proposes 4 priorities to resolve the 'crisis', while Russia intensifies efforts to capture key towns 🌎. US Treasury Sec. Yellen stresses the importance of passing a Ukraine aid bill, stating there's no substitute for Congress providing military and budget support. As global citizens, let's promote constructive dialogue, recognizing diverse viewpoints in these challenging times 🌍☮️
